content: Fourth quarter sales were $313 million, up 1% from the prior year period with organic sales increasing 5%. Adjusted operating income was $35 million this year, down 1% from adjusted $35.4 million last year, and adjusted operating margin of 11.2% was down 20 basis points. On an adjusted basis operating income was $145.9 million versus $151 million last year, a decline of 3%. On an adjusted basis, 2022 net income per share was a $1.98, up 2% from last year. For the fourth quarter, sales were $205 million, down 3% from the prior year period. Excluding $11.1 million of restructuring related charges in the current year, adjusted operating profit of $17.2 million was down 9% and adjusted operating margin of 8.4% was down 60 basis points. For the year, Industrial sales were $833 million, down 7% from $896 million a year ago with organic sales down 1%. On an adjusted basis, operating profit was $70 million, a decrease of 28% while adjusted operating margin was 8.4%, down 250 basis points. Excluding a favorable restructuring adjustment of 300,000, adjusted operating profit of $17.8 million was up 8% from last year. For the full year Aerospace sales were $429 million, up 18% from $362 million a year ago. On an adjusted basis, operating profit was $75.9 million, up 43%, and adjusted operating margin was 17.7%, up 300 basis points. Other income of $2.5 million driven by non-operating pension, an effective tax rate between 24.5% and 25.5%, CapEx of approximately $50 million, average diluted shares of approximately $51 million, and cash conversion of approximately 100%. For 2023, we would expect in the neighborhood now as we're looking at things more specifically of $15 million to $17 million potentially flow through in this year.
